Ornella.title: Ninotchka
Ornella.synopsis: A stern Russian woman sent to Paris to supervise the sale of jewels finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

Ornella.title: A Pigeon Sat on a Branch Reflecting on Existence
Ornella.synopsis: A series of absurdist vignettes exploring the human condition through surreal and darkly humorous scenarios.

Ornella.title: Barbara
Ornella.synopsis: A doctor in 1980s East Germany is banished to a small country hospital after applying for an exit visa.

Ornella.title: To Be or Not to Be
Ornella.synopsis: A Polish actor and his wife help a Polish pilot escape from the Nazis during World War II.

Ornella.title: The Lives of Others
Ornella.synopsis: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

Mariel.title: Milk
Mariel.synopsis: The story of Harvey Milk, California's first openly gay elected official.

Mariel.title: Nazareno Cruz y el Lobo
Mariel.synopsis: A young man cursed to become a werewolf every full moon falls in love with a beautiful woman.

Mariel.title: Inherit the Wind
Mariel.synopsis: Based on the famous Scopes Monkey Trial, a teacher is arrested for teaching evolution in a small Tennessee town.

Mariel.title: The Wind That Shakes the Barley
Mariel.synopsis: Two brothers fight for Irish independence in the 1920s, but find themselves on opposite sides of the civil war.

Mariel.title: Esperando la Carroza
Mariel.synopsis: A dysfunctional family tries to deal with their elderly mother who they believe is dead.

Florencia.title: Paddington
Florencia.synopsis: A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home, finding himself taken in by the Brown family.

Florencia.title: Phantom Thread
Florencia.synopsis: A renowned dressmaker in 1950s London finds his carefully controlled life disrupted by a young, strong-willed woman.

Florencia.title: Legally Blonde
Florencia.synopsis: Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen, is dumped by her boyfriend and decides to follow him to law school.

Florencia.title: Flow
Florencia.synopsis: A cat separated from its family embarks on a journey through a surreal, post-apocalyptic world.

Florencia.title: The Devil Wears Prada
Florencia.synopsis: A young woman lands a job as an assistant to a powerful fashion magazine editor.

Paola.title: Fantastic Planet
Paola.synopsis: On a distant planet, giant blue aliens keep humans as pets, but one human's knowledge threatens their society.

Paola.title: It's Such a Beautiful Day
Paola.synopsis: A stick figure named Bill struggles with mental illness and the meaning of life in this animated trilogy.

Paola.title: Nostalgia for the Light
Paola.synopsis: In Chile's Atacama Desert, astronomers search for distant galaxies while women search for the remains of their loved ones.

Paola.title: Another Round
Paola.synopsis: Four high school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives.

Paola.title: After Life
Paola.synopsis: In a waystation between heaven and earth, the recently deceased must choose one memory to keep for eternity.
